content: The subject (almost) says it all. I am using the igpublisher.jar from FHIR 1.8. If I have extensions in my profile, it shows the extensions in the differential view. But if I have modifierExtensions, it only show the modifierExtensions in the _snapshot_ view (but not in the differential view).

As far as I can tell, I'm putting modifierExtensions in the differential elements (in the structure definition) exactly the same way I put in the extensions -- so I don't understand why it works in one case but not the other. Possibly a bug in the igpublisher.jar?
Sounds like it. Check that the modifierExtensions are in both places in the published StructureDefinition. If they are but aren't rendering, submit a publication tracker item.
Yes, confirmed that the modiferExtension is in the snapshot and differential of the generated xml and json. I'll submit a tracker item. Thanks.
